replies.body:
yay more mini games for supports {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 
thresh souls and now these new ones
Another league of tanks then{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
what's wrong with that? Better then the league of yasuo and assassins
Let me just go back and remember how FUN the game was when the juggernauts update game out
you see the changes to sej? you can avoid her whole kit and she's....single target based now. don't worry! everyones safe from her

This is Awesome! I'm so excited, Nice work Riot.
Please riddle me this though, when is my buu {{champion:83}} gonna get some skin love?
pls and thenks
I hear you pro. Yorick may have his mist walkers but still needs some friends and a new look

Spelltheif was always the top support item, coin was the lowest, only time people bought coin was because they couldnt poke enough in the lane for spelltheif to be viable, so they got the sustain and gold from coin, but if coin is now offering even less gold than before, and no sustain what so ever, and spellthief now plays the role of talisman, what is the point in getting it, the only champ that would benefit is udyr, just so he can get an extra point into his last spell.
Getting to level 18 isn't something that happens every game, even as a solo laner.

There should at least be a magnet effect when going to pick up the coins.

Like, if I'm playing {{champion:40}} or {{champion:16}} I'm not walking in to get chunked out for some extra cash when I can get {{item:3303}} and poke them out safely.

rip Zac {{champion:154}}  
this rework killed him so ill never be playing him again

Just kill off sejuani please. You've removed her team fighting presence with the removal of her W's aoe damage. she's going to be kited and never land her stun. Her ult is going to miss and if it lands the secondary effect is dodgable..when exactly is she meant to be the big whore on a boar team fighter like she is now? What on earth are these nerfs - she's not even played and you hit her like this.

the only positive change she got was her passive...

Why.
Cmon! Rito throw some more new stuff at me! I can take it! I am a SUPPORT MAIN!!! XD
IM WITH YA MAN, I CAN HANDLE IT ALL, I CAN HANDLE MORE THAN THIS GRILL
Is this coming out before or after MSI? Cos I sure as hell do not wanna see the whole worlds 2015 and the whole juggernaut fiasco again.
Pls. The support minigames need to be stopped.
When Rift Herald gets VU before Nunu and Udyr lmao.
Udyr got a VU, it just costs 3250rp

Ok, Riot, it's been a long time coming. WHERE IS THE NEXT ILLAOI SKIN?
Surely she should've gotten a 2nd skin before Jhin, so srsly where is it?

Considering MR items are getting a bit of a buff against sustained magic damage I feel like sustained mages/ap fighters could benefit from the ap equivalent of Black Cleaver. Wits End's shred is so negligible that it's only noticeable on tanks and the stats it gives you are really terrible for anybody that's not Volibear.

This was going to be a reply to someone on the NA post but you can't comment in different regions apparently, anyway they said the ancient coin passive is fine for his thresh which he already runs ancient coin on but I don't think he realised the old passive gives health and mana on minion death, new one just gives mana (or gold), seriously so bad to have the passive rely on taking free poke but it not give health back, relic shield was changed to give health to the support on top of giving it to the ally(adc) for that exact reason (I'm pretty sure). Actually a pretty big nerf for the item in my eyes. Don't get me wrong I'm not opposed to the idea but I think this is being executed poorly.
I also think Talisman of Ascension will be bought less now as supports can get a slow enemies down and speed themselves up with Frost Queens Claim, I barely see Talisman as it is :/
Those support items are a great idea. Glad to see them getting some love.

Dear Riot games,

Hello and Happy Easter.

Thanks again - Shia

  (\_/)
 ^(0_0)^ 
 c(")(") ooo
